title: Open Air Antique Fair
shortDescription: Discover vintage treasures in our outdoor market.
description: Come and explore a curated selection of antique and vintage vendors. A perfect event for collectors and curious minds alike! Featuring local sellers and live music.

title: Community Art Walk
shortDescription: A celebration of local art and culture.
description: Stroll through our market and see art from over 20 local creators. Live painting, music, and family-friendly workshops throughout the day!

title: Kids' Summer Camp Day
shortDescription: Fun and learning for kids aged 5-12.
description: Join us for a day of crafts, gardening lessons, and cooking workshops designed just for kids. Lunch included. Parents welcome to stay or drop off.
